	public partial class TryCatch
	{
		public Task TestAsync()
		{
			Task ReadAsync()
			{
				try
				{
					SimpleFile.Clear();
					return SimpleFile.ReadAsync();
				}
				catch (Exception ex)
				{
					return Task.FromException<object>(ex);
				}
			}
			return ReadAsync();
